suggest.ext-intl: use for Utf8String::compare, Utf8String::transliterate, Strings::toAscii, Strings::normalize, Strings::compare, NumberFormatCell, DateFormatCell,
suggest.ext-iconv: use for Strings::reverse, Strings::chr, Strings::toAscii, MimePart::encodeHeader, EncodingHelper::attemptConversion
suggest.ext-curl: handle http client with curl support.
suggest.ext-imagick: use for Imagick based image processing.
suggest.ext-gd: use for GD library based image processing.
suggest.ext-openssl: use for Crypto and RS signature in JWT
suggest.ext-gmp: use for ES signature in JWT
